metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17883 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An attacker could send an email with a malicious link to an OTRS system or an agent. If a logged in agent opens this link, it could cause the execution of JavaScript in the context of OTRS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-17883` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.13-1
otrs2 - 6.0.13-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.13-1').
